message.body: Are you guys around this weekend? Going to the oyster festival?
If you are coming I suggest you park at our apartment and walk over with us.
Or if u want to come later you can park at our apartment and meet us somewhere.
Okay. I have to see if I can get enough work done in the morning- if so I'd plan to get there at 11:45 and walk over with you guys. I'll let you know in the morning if that's okay?
